question: Pregunta: ¿Qué entidades (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) aparecen en este texto?

question: Pregunta: ¿Qué entidades (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) aparecen en este texto?
text: Texto: "Con el diagnóstico de neoformación renal estadio T3bN0M0 con trombo tumoral nivel II, se decide intervenir, conjuntamente con el servicio de cirugía cardiaca de nuestro centro, realizando esternotomía y laparotomía subcostal izquierda y, previa liberación del ángulo esplénico del colon mediante apertura del retroperitoneo a nivel del mesenterio, nefrectomía radical izquierda permaneciendo la pieza de nefrectomía anclada por la vena renal trombosada."
answer: Respuesta: {'Disorder': ['neoformación renal', 'trombo tumoral', 'la vena renal trombosada'], 'Patient': [], 'H-Professional': ['el servicio de cirugía']}
translation: Traducción inglesa del texto: "With a diagnosis of renal neoplasm stage T3bN0M0 with a level II tumor thrombus, it was decided to perform surgery, in conjunction with the cardiac surgery department of our center, performing a sternotomy and left subcostal laparotomy and, after freeing the splenic flexure of the colon by opening the retroperitoneum at the level of the mesentery, a left radical nephrectomy was performed, with the nephrectomy specimen remaining anchored by the thrombosed renal vein."
description: Descripción del texto: A renal neoplasm at stage T3bN0M0 with a level II tumor thrombus. A surgical treatment was performed, specifically a left radical nephrectomy, in collaboration with cardiac surgeons due to the complexity involving the renal vein thrombus. The procedure involved sternotomy and left subcostal laparotomy, with dissection of the splenic flexure of the colon and retroperitoneal structures. You have to find out which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in the text.

question: Pregunta: ¿Qué entidades (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) aparecen en este texto?
text: Texto: "Remitido a oftalmología a los 40 días, para estudio de fondo de ojo, presentaba la siguiente exploración oftalmológica: la agudeza visual (AV) era de 0,8 en ambos ojos, la presión intraocular (PIO) de 13 mm de Hg y en el fondo de ojo derecho (OD) se observó una microhemorragia por encima de papila y cuatro émbolos de colesterol y en el fondo del ojo izquierdo (OI) otros dos émbolos localizados en rama temporal y nasal."
translation: Traducción inglesa del texto: "Referred to ophthalmology 40 days later for a fundus examination, the following ophthalmological examination was performed: visual acuity (VA) was 0.8 in both eyes, intraocular pressure (IOP) was 13 mm Hg, and in the right eye fundus (OD) a microhemorrhage was observed above the optic disc and four cholesterol emboli, and in the left eye fundus (OS) two other emboli were located in the temporal and nasal branches."
description: Descripción del texto: A fundus examination by an ophthalmologist that found a microhemorrhage in the right eye and multiple cholesterol emboli in both eyes. No other health disorders or health professionals beyond the ophthalmologist are mentioned. You have to find out which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in the text.
